channel.title: CVE Feed for Foscam -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Foscam -- all products

item.title: CVE-2017-2805|2024-08-05T14:02:07.703Z -- foscam -- indoor%20ip%20camera%20c1%20series
item.description: An exploitable stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the web management interface used by the Foscam C1 Indoor HD Camera. A specially crafted http request can cause a stack-based buffer overflow resulting in overwriting arbitrary data on the stack frame. An attacker can simply send an http request to the device to trigger this vulnerability.
